column4: Can any op here help me with an issue that comes with an untimely find that someone has used some kind of logger or rootkit to get my private information...  I need to figure out how to scan for the kit or trojan or possible "virus" ?
there are two good rootkit scanners in the reops: rkhunter  and  chkrootkit
not sure, but I run rkhunter and chkrootkit on every install before doing anything else and I see those that you posted
